author: gates
msg: Removed PigLogger.java, which should have been removed as part of the last checkin.

author: nbubna
msg: getKeys() was failing to include Data keys

author: djd
msg: Add a utility JDBC assert to test that a SQLWarning (typically returned from a method like Connection.getWarnings) is null, ie. no warnings. If the assert fails then the message will contain the text of the warning. Replace the previous use of assertNull() which leaves no traces as to what the warning was.

author: andreas
msg: Check document existence before news editor usecase parameter initialization.

author: andreas
msg: DocumentSourceFactory: throw SourceNotFoundException instead of NPE if the link target doesn't exist.
